title: Investors Need A Process, Not Predictions
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: MarketWatch quotes the “godfather” of chart analysts forecasting a bear market. If so, why didn’t he offer us this warning before October’s wipe-out? And more to the point, what relevance do daily market movements have to each individual’s unique circumstances, goals and timelines? Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
